Hands sculpting destiny, adjusting lapels with the precision of an artist, each touch a brushstroke of empowerment
pages.credit: John Galliano 2010, photographed by Jan Welters. This image was first published in ELLE France and appeared in 2017 in the book “The House of Dior - Seventy Years of Haute Couture” by Katie Somerville.
